categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Arran Flekk was a Human who served as an Imperial scout during the Galactic Civil War.

Flekk came from a long line of soldiers who served the queens of Naboo for many generations. Flekk entered the Imperial Academy at age seventeen and eventually rose to the rank of lieutenant. Flekk was highly decorated during his time in service and was eventually transferred to the YT-2400 light freighter Predator's Beak. However, it crash-landed on the planet Yorgraxx and was left with no functioning engines of communication systems, while Flekk and Vor Harkass were the only survivors. After they had been there over a month, they encountered the surviving crew of a crashed Rebel Alliance ship and they joined forces. They soon after entered the fortress of the Sith Lord Quorlac Fornayh, where they confronted his reawakened spirit.
Arran Flekk featured in the Star Wars Roleplaying Game scenario Shadows in the Force and has no canonical gender, as that is established by the player.
